title: Monsters
description: Alia Cheveyo has left her home to join with a group of strangers who share an extraordinary power, but is this power something that Alia can bear to use?When they attack a group of vampire mobsters in Las Vegas, Alia must decide who are the real monsters...NOTE: This is a short story and is a sequel to "The Chermasu" which you might want to read first, though it is not necessary.
author: Brian McKinley
